title: Purchase history?
body: Where is the "purchase history" button in the new shop? i cant find it :(

replies.body: Is there a way to go further back in time than like 3 months?
I'm also curious if there is any way to go back further. I want to know how many hextech champ shards I've had to purchase to farm blue essence. I've spent close to 70k ip from what I can see.

Definitely can help you out with that!

After you open the new store, go to the far upper left side where you will see a person symbol and a cogwheel, click on that.  In the new window that opens, go to the far left hand side and select "purchase history" which is right under "Account".

I hope this helps!  Let me know if you still can't find it!
Sorry for the late reply! I found it the day after (after a lot of searching :D) and i totaly forgot i asked about it.. I didnt close the thread :< Thanks anyway!
{{summoner:4}}  Go to Store, Accounts, PURCHASE HISTORY{{summoner:6}} But you can't find the beginning of time{{champion:5}} So the purchase history has no use{{item:3151}}
